comment: Am I the only crazy one, but am not seeing any debris from such an awful crash? I see tree branches and some things but one would think there would be much more debris? Where's the limo, did it blow up into a million pieces? Ideas/thoughts?
amr:
# ::snt Am I the only crazy one, but am not seeing any debris from such an awful crash? I see tree branches and some things but one would think there would be much more debris? Where's the limo, did it blow up into a million pieces? Ideas/thoughts?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (c2 / crazy-03
                  :ARG1 (ii / i)
                  :mod (o / only))
            :ARG2 (s / see-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (d / debris
                        :source (c3 / crash-01
                              :mod (a2 / awful
                                    :degree (s2 / such))))))
      :snt2 (c4 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (s3 / see-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (b / branch
                              :part-of (t / tree))
                        :op2 (t2 / thing
                              :quant (s4 / some))))
            :ARG2 (t3 / think-01
                  :ARG0 (o2 / one)
                  :ARG1 (d2 / debris
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                              :ARG3 (m2 / more
                                    :quant (m3 / much))))))
      :snt3 a3
      :op1 (b2 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (l / limousine)
            :ARG2 a)
      :op2 (b3 / blow-up-06
            :ARG1 l
            :ARG2 (p / piece
                  :quant 1000000))
      :op4 (s5 / slash
            :op1 (ii3 / idea)
            :op2 t3)
      :polarity a)

comment: Please do not discriminate against or use terms that are offensive to a religious group.
amr:
# ::snt Please do not discriminate against or use terms that are offensive to a religious group.
(o / or
      :op1 (d / discriminate-02
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (t / term
                  :ARG0-of (o2 / offend-01
                        :ARG1 (g / group
                              :mod (r / religion)))))
      :op2 (u / use-01
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 t))

comment: Hey there, Racist comments are hurtful and unwanted. Please refrain from using them and consider other people’s feelings. Thank you
amr:
# ::snt Hey there, Racist comments are hurtful and unwanted. Please refrain from using them and consider other people’s feelings. Thank you
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 (c / comment-01
                        :ARG0 (r / racist)))
            :op2 (w / want-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 c)
            :mod (h2 / hey
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (r2 / refrain-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 c))
            :op2 (c2 / consider-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (f / feel-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :mod (o / other)))))
      :snt3 (t / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)))

comment: Race, creed, color, religion or nationality have very little to do with operating a motor vehicle.
amr:

(h / have-to-do-with-04
      :ARG0 (o / or
            :op1 (r / race)
            :op2 (c / creed)
            :op3 (c2 / color)
            :op4 (r2 / religion)
            :op5 (n / nationality))
      :ARG1 (o2 / operate-01
            :ARG1 (v / vehicle
                  :mod (m / motor)))
      :ARG2 (l / little
            :degree (v2 / very)))
